data.title: Independent and integrated renewable energy producer
data.meta_description: Akuo invents and co-builds new models of renewable energy production for the sustainable development of territories.
data.text:
ü•≥Let's celebrate the Minas wind farm's anniversary! üìç Located in Lavalleja, #Uruguay, with its 14 Vestas V112 wind turbines, each rated at 3.0 MW, the Minas wind farm generates a total output of 42 MW, avoiding the emission of 1,800 tonnes of CO2 every year. A key player in the fight against climate change. üîå By supplying a large proportion of the electricity needed by the department of Lavalleja, it has helped Uruguay to generate 91% of its electricity from renewable sources in 2022, playing a crucial role in the transformation of the national energy landscape! But numbers don't tell the whole story. ü§ù Beyond its energy impact, the Minas wind farm has also taken its place in the local community and the country, particularly through the funding of various projects via the @[Akuo Foundation], including @[Fe y Alegr√≠a Uruguay] which aims to promote quality global education to foster social transformation through workshops on traditional cultures, waste recycling and the use of renewable energies. ‚û° Find out more about their project: https://lnkd.in/esavYEQi Immerse yourself in the power plant with the beautiful images from Cyril Dion's documentary for @[ARTE] Un monde Nouveau. #renewableenergy #windpower #windenergy

See the publication

üåûüîå Invest in Greece's energy transition with Akuo! üåç Akuo launches a crowdfunding campaign for 4 solar power plants located in Thessaly, Greece. It is the first campaign since AkuoCoop and @[Lendosphere] joined forces, and it is the opportunity for AkuoCoop to open up to the international market. üåø This initiative enables all European citizens to participate in the refinancing of the Thessaly solar farm, thus becoming active players in the European energy transition. With a total output of 4 MWp, the 4 plants produce 6.3 GWh annually which is the equivalent to the consumption of 570 households. The Thessaly solar farm prevents the emission of 2,100 tonnes of CO2 every year. For more information on how to invest, visit Akuocoop by Lendosphere and invest as little as ‚Ç¨100 ‚û° https://lnkd.in/enkDRE6Z #Renewableenergy #Energytransition #solarenergy #cleanenergy #crowdfundingüåøüåû üì∏ Niki Pateraki

See the publication

‚òÄ Our first European crowdfunding campaign on @[AkuoCoop] by @[Lendosphere] has officially launched! Want to know more about how it works and how you can invest in the energy transition? Watch the video below. üì¢ Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to add meaning to your savings and to contribute to our Greek project of 4 solar power plants in Thessaly! ‚û° https://lnkd.in/enkDRE6Z #energytransition #Solarenergy #Renewableenergy #Cleanenergy

üí° Empowering Women and Innovating Agriculture: Akuo‚Äôs #Agrivoltaics Journey in Poland   üéôÔ∏è On June 18, @[Blanche de Talhou√´t-Roy], Vice Director of the @[Akuo Foundation], showcased our innovative approach to agrivoltaism at a conference focusing on ‚ÄúWomen and #agriculture, leaders of innovation and entrepreneurs of the living world‚Äù, hosted by the French Embassy in Poland.   Our agrivoltaics projects, which combine farming and power generation, not only promote sustainable energy production but also empower women in entrepreneurship while addressing the urgent need to adapt to climate change, which are important themes supported by the Akuo Foundation.    Poland‚Äôs strong interest in agricultural innovation, such as agrivoltaics, presents an opportunity for us to collaborate and create virtuous synergies in the transition to a more sustainable energy and agricultural system.    ü§ù Akuo stands ready to support Poland in reaching its renewable energy goals and facilitating its energy transition.   Thank you Blanche for your participation, we are proud to contribute to Poland's sustainable future!   #Renewableenergy #Energytransition

‚úîÔ∏è Get to Know Wind Energy with @[Alexander Klein]! At Akuo, we believe in making renewable energy accessible and understandable for everyone. That's why we're excited to share our latest video featuring @[Alexander Klein], where he breaks down wind energy terms in a simple and engaging way. ‚¨áÔ∏èCheck out the video now and become a wind energy pro in no time! #WindEnergy #RenewableEnergy #WindPower

üåç Did you know that switching to renewables saved EU electricity consumers ‚Ç¨100 billion from 2021-2023? Imagine what more we can achieve with the Green Deal! ü§ùOver 400 organizations from various sectors are united in urging EU leaders to prioritize the Green Deal for a secure, competitive, and prosperous Europe. üì¢ This isn't just about policy‚Äîit's about our future. We need bold action now! Together, we can ensure a sustainable and thriving Europe for generations to come. Let‚Äôs not gamble on our future, let‚Äôs build it.
